page.title: 16CARLTON VILLAGE
page.content: Carlton is quite a small village, but one in which the church, chapel, local shops and village school are still in use. We have a large playing field with five swings on it, and quite a large field for football.On one side of the playing field is a huge 2OO year-old oak tree, which is great for climbing. On the playing field Ithink that we shouuld have more swings, or a climbing frame at least.The roundabout that we had was old and falling apart. The council took it away to mend and paint it last summer and we haven't had it back yet!They keep on saying that they will give us a "Jungle Jim" a kind of climbing frame....I'll believe it when I see it!
